doc.summary: Class where to find the codec factory.
doc.text:
Class where to find the codec factory. Can be left empty to use the class of
the parameter type.

doc.summary: Method name of the factory method.
doc.text: Method name of the factory method. Can be left empty to use the default value: fieldOf

doc.summary:
The dynamic codec field type will create a MapCodec from a static method

The method is defined through the fields defined in the annotation.
doc.text:
The dynamic codec field type will create a MapCodec from a static method

The method is defined through the fields defined in the annotation.

The method must return a MapCodec with a matching type. As arguments it
must accept a String which defines the field name.

For example using @Dynamic(WorldSeedHolder.class) on a parameter of type
long will get you a field codec for a long that defaults to the
current world seed using WorldSeedHolder.
